page.title: 15RECREATION CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: There are many games which most children play both at home and at school, especially the game of{'It'. To play 'It' is fairly easy and any number of children can join in. You have a chaser and all the rest of the children have to be chased. Whoever is caught becomes the chaser. {Tennis}is very popular too. It can be for two (singles) or four (doubles) players. They each have a racket and try to hit the tennis ball back and forth over a net stretched across the middle of the court. Points are scored - 15, 30, 40. If a player hits the ball outside the boundary lines, a point goes to the other player, also if it goes into the net or bounces twice. We have tennis courts at school where we can play one day a week during play time. We will learn properly when we are older.
